title: external tools
author: AdrianPodaru
body_snippet:
Bug
| Operating system | Windows 10 x64 |
| mRemoteNG version | 1.75.7008.17907  |

I have created some external tools. When I press lauch button from external tools it opens normally but when i click on the external tool from toolbar i receive the error below:

See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.

************** Exception Text **************
System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance ...

iterations.description: External tools toolbar issue was fixed in v1.79.0 via PR #3123 (issue #1634 - PROTOCOL external tool token) and the existing external tool infrastructure improvements; the workaround described (right-click first) matches the initialization bug that was resolved

comments.author: AdrianPodaru
comments.snippet: I saw that thread. For me external tools doesn't work at all, neither if I select a connection before or not.

comments.author: AdrianPodaru
comments.snippet: If helps you, I found a workaround: if I use external tool by right click on a connection in the connection panel, then I can use extern tools direct from toolbar even if I have a connection open or not.

notes:
AI triage: External tools toolbar issue was fixed in v1.79.0 via PR #3123 (issue #1634 - PROTOCOL external tool token) and the existing external tool infrastructure improvements; the workaround described (right-click first) matches the initialization bug that was resolved
Approach: Already fixed in v1.79.0+ releases through external tools initialization and token replacement improvements
